text:
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois?
November 5* 1956
Dr. Burton Paulu
Director, ICtJQM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis 14, Minnesota
Dear Burton:
Unless you hear from us to the contrary we
accept your suggestion for your visit here on
November lj?-l6. Actually these days are better
for both Sohooley and Skernia. There still remains
the possibility of Sohooley being tied up on our TV
trial on either one or both dates but this possibility
is less remote than the 12th and 13th. At this hour
I am scheduled to meet with Howbum, Steetle, and
Lowry on Monday, and I go on trial to be on the
witness stand on Tuesday, November 13*
Best regards.
Sincerely,
Frank E. Sohooley
President
FEBjfmh
cos Dr, Skornia
